title: AI turns the firehose into a funnel
description: AI has matured from an instrument for efficiency into one that unlocks investigative discovery. The ultimate newsroom function of AI won’t be saving journalists a few minutes on rote tasks; it’ll be helping them uncover stories that would otherwise remain hidden. The promise of AI is its ability to sift through massive amounts of information...
